The Born Basic Anti: Bac hand sanitizers manufactured by Real Clean Distribuciones SA de CV in Mexico were recalled.
Born Basic products not manufactured by: 3. The hand sanitizer bottles manufactured at the facility in Mexico were found to contain methanol, a dangerous chemical.
The company took several steps to addres: including issuing a voluntary recall, halting production at the affected facility, hiring a crisis management company for refunds, and informing the public through email and social media.
